title: OBJ to Pats trade rumors; Gruden's Derek Carr/Kyler Murray decision; Belichick/Saban down the home stretch
itunes:title: OBJ to Pats trade rumors; Gruden's Derek Carr/Kyler Murray decision; Belichick/Saban down the home stretch
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff explains why an Odell Beckham to the Patriots trade shouldn't happen, why the Raiders should trade Derek Carr and take Kyler Murray in the draft, why the Giants are a fit for Carr, why Belichick and Saban are coming down the home stretch of their dynasty runs, and answers questions in Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
